descriptionHtml:
UPDATE for missing file


thank you very much has \" svaalbard \" For the Video


  [youtube]5VWq11xPQd8[/youtube]



hello,
I am always so bad in English.
This mod adds two spells to summon mounts tiger in the blue palace of solitude (picture)



===============
installation
===============
Extract the archive in the Skyrim directory and active tigre mount.esp




=========
NOTES
=========

Sorry for my English French.
Approve if you wish.

known Issues
No bugs detected when I tested it in the CK. All meshes and textures are unique and must be compatible with mods.

Thank to  \" GG17\" From \"jeuxvideo.com\" for this Idea (Merci mec)

Thanks to \" scrivener07 \" For his help !

Thank you to The Nexus
Thank you in Bethesda
Thank you to you to check my mod! 
My Mods:
Tigre Race & Spell :  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15133
